Synopsis: Generates a random file name with a specified length and extension.
Description: This function generates a random file name with a specified length and extension. The file name is created using random letters only.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-RandomFileName -Length 8 -Extension "txt"
Generates a random file name with a length of 8 characters and appends the extension ".txt".

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-RandomFileName -Extension "docx"
Generates a random file name with a default length of 16 characters and appends the extension ".docx".
